text: Pen ogɨnap kab adek lum sɨkol sɨkol lɨnɨgab okok yapɨl jakɨnɨgab ak pen, kɨdɨl am wos ma gek, sub nɨŋɨd mɨlep gɨnɨgab apin ak, binɨb okok God takaw ak kɨdek won ak nɨgel tep gaknɨŋ dɨnɨgabal apin agak. Tep gaknɨŋ dɨnɨgabal ak pen, yokɨp sɨkol won olap mɨdɨl, binɨb ogɨnap takaw agel nɨŋɨd akaŋ, mɨŋel ogɨnap apek, takaw nop ak kelɨgɨnɨgabal agɨl apin agak.
